name: phobos
title: Phobos
author: JanSharp
description:
Phobos is planned to be an optimizing bytecode compiler for Lua with some language extensions and a type system. See readme for what is implemented and what is planned.

For more info see the readme (on the homepage or in the mod files), especially the section about the 'Factorio Mod'. (In short: The mod is 99% a library)
